title: The Second Part, Of Common-wealth
sourceDesc: The text here is from the 1909 Clarendon Press edition (now in the public domain), as put online by the Online Libary of Liberty. That edition follows the original 1651 edition, but with corrections from the printed ERRATA sheet incorporated into the text.
